ygData.subject: Re: (no subject)
ygData.msgSnippet: Howard, why don t you post the pictures on this list or give us a url containing them.  I for one have always loved a dramatic evil pose, and would like to see
ygData.messageBody:
Howard, why don't you post the pictures on this list or give us a url
containing them. I for one have always loved a dramatic evil pose, and
would like to see nice ones in EQ. I would send you pictures too, but as of
the moment I am not playing and my shadowknight is a troll :P... anyway, if
you don't do this its no big deal. I just think it'd be nice to see.


>From: "Howard Chan" <howard.chan@...>
>Reply-To: eq_shadowknights@onelist.com
>To: <eq_shadowknights@onelist.com>
>Subject: [eq_shadowknights] (no subject)
>Date: Mon, 5 Jul 1999 01:58:42 -0600
>
>From: "Howard Chan" <howard.chan@...>
>
>Remlin:
>
>Where was it taken? Very, very nice background!
>
>To those who are going to send screenshots to me, please send them in .jpg
>format. Pictures in .bmp format takes too long to download even on a cable
>connection.
>
